name: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies: Oz's Trio
summary:
One of the most well-known tales, The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, and its lessons can easily be converted to the land of zombies. A true hero should have a strong heart and courage to fight the endless enemies, use their brains so as to come up with tactics against the toughest of bosses and not get overpowered by zombies, and most importantly, a true hero must have a good team to challenge the impossible.

However, Zombies: Oz's Trio is no fairy tale and happy endings depend strictly on battlefield experience and firepower. We introduce a new set of unique DLC weapons that will help you come back home safely.
